text: New York City Mayor de Blasio announces formation of a fireworks task force that "will target suppliers, distributors and possessors of large quantities of" the explosives. https://t.co/F27g2VEcX6

text: “We’re in another pandemic of hate": The anniversary of Vincent Chin's death is taking a renewed urgency as Asian American Pacific Islanders are being scapegoated for an international health crisis they have no control over. https://t.co/G9PFwjrS4E - @NBCAsianAmerica
